classification.description: The selected ACMG classification term based on the aggregated evidence

classification_rationale.description: Brief explanation of why this classification was selected based on case counts and evidence quality

description.description: The mandatory template for the selected classification, filled in with specific details from the evidence

notes.description: Detailed curator-style synthesis in Markdown format with structure: per-paper findings ([PMID: X](link) | Author Year: findings) â†’ synthesis if needed

pmid.description: PubMed ID of the source paper

box_id.description: The bounding box ID from the source text in the paper

commentary.description: What this specific evidence states (appears as annotation in highlighted PDF)

citations.description: All citations supporting factual claims in the detailed notes, used to annotate source PDFs
